title.rendered: Bank Upholstered Stackable Side chair – 4 Leg

content.rendered:
The Bank Upholstered Side chair can be paired with any of our Bank chairs & stools.

Available with a stackable 4 leg chrome frame. 

Currently only available in Grey fabric as shown.

Held in stock for delivery in 3-4 working days. CRIB 5 Certified. 1 Year guarantee.

Requires basic self assembly. Stackable up to 4 high.
